description.value:
Trigger A creature moves into a space with the handheld quaker or interacts with it

Effect The handheld quaker vibrates visibly and rolls initiative.

A creature within difficult terrain created by the quaker takes a â€“2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves and actions with the Manipulate trait, including @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disable a Device]{Disable Device}.

details.description: This small toy-like device has a hidden mechanism meant to be activated by the user, but the centuries have eroded its magical-mechanical components to the point that they activate at the slightest touch.
details.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:22] (trained) to deactivate the mechanism; @Check[crafting|dc:20] (trained) to identify and repair the problem components; two successes are required to disable the hazard

publication.title: Pathfinder Society Scenario #6-13: All That Glitters

details.reset: The trap deactivates and resets if 1 minute passes without a creature being within 5' of the handheld quaker.
details.routine:
At its initiative, to determine what the quaker does, roll [[/gmr 1d4]] and consult the following table:

1: No action

2: A small quake: the terrain in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] centered on the quaker shakes briefly. A creature in an affected square is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone] (@Check[reflex|dc:21] save).

3: A medium quake: the terrain within the vault shakes constantly, transforming it into difficult terrain until its next turn. A creature in an affected square is knocked prone and takes @Damage[2d8[bludgeoning]] damage from the fall (@Check[reflex|dc:21|basic] save).

4: A great quake: the terrain within the vault moves in waves, transforming it into greater difficult terrain until its next turn. A creature in an affected square is violently slammed to the ground, knocked prone and taking @Damage[(2d8+6)[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:25|basic] save).
